user_query: I'm planning a family vacation and I need to check the details of multiple hotel bookings. Can you fetch the bulk details of the hotel bookings using the Truecaller API? Additionally, I need access to the latest news articles for travel recommendations from the Revista Verde API.

TaskList.description: Fetch the bulk details of hotel bookings using the Truecaller API.
Retrieve the latest news articles for travel recommendations using the Revista Verde API.
